casebody.data:
Third Department,

February, 1964

(February 4, 1964) In the Matter of Vernon Murphy, Appellant, v. Leo A. Larkin, as Corporation Counsel of the City of New York, et al., Constituting the Civil Service Commission of the City of New York, et al., Respondents.

Motion to resettle order granted so as, in accordance with the decision, to provide for affirmance, without costs, and in all other respects denied. Present—Gibson, P. J., Herlihy, Reynolds, Taylor and Aulisi, JJ. [See 20 A D 2d 595.]
